title: Super House of Dead Ninjas v0.8.7 incl True Ninja Pack-ALiAS
description:

Release date: 7/08/2013 Protection: Steam
Files: 06x10.00MB Language: English

RELEASE NOTES 
Ã‚Â¯_ _Ã‚Â¯
Descend a seemingly-endless tower, wielding an arsenal of deadly
ninja weapons and attacks, as the fearsome Crimson Ninja. This 2D
action-platformer uses ninja magic to generate every tower
randomly, so no two adventures are the same! Based on the hit Flash
game from developers Megadev and Adult Swim Games.
Now you can play as the fearsome One-Armed Ninja from the original
House of Dead Ninjas, try your hand at the all new super hard
"Ninja" Difficulty, AND refine your weapon skills with the dreaded
Hookshot. Can you handle all this ninja goodness?
Features:
- One-Armed Ninja Character: deals double melee damage but cannot
use magic
- Ninja Mode: all-new deadly difficulty
- Speed Run Mode
- Boss Rush Mode
- 3 New Weapons
- 2 New items
- 10 New Achievements
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
1. Unzip & Unrar
2. Run Setup.exe for install
3. Have Fun!!!!
Ripped: Nothing
